title: Artificial Intelligence in Melanoma Diagnostics: Revolutionizing Detection and Diagnosis
details: SZ Mbatha, A Madaree, R Mehrotra, Z Dlamini - Navigating Melanoma Treatment …, 2025
abstract: Melanoma, a heterogeneous and deadly skin cancer, accounts for 75–80% of skin cancer-related deaths, despite representing only 2–5% of cases. Early diagnosis is crucial, with a 5-year survival rate of over 99% for stage 1–2 melanoma, while stage …
